text: Ghungrila railway station (Urdu and ) is located next to Chehari Bangial village, Rawalpindi district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Rawalpindi District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Ghungrila railway station
